title: Meme Smuggler
paragraph: Its no doubt memes are many people's source of entertainment, or perhaps better worded as many people's 'high'. The ever growing meme mentality is shaping society in unique ways. I mean, whatsapp group chats and 'chillin with a bro' basically culminates in sessions consisting of meme regurgitation. Face it people, society has become a land infested with meme zombies, and I'm not saying that's a bad thing.
